titles.title: To amend the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 regarding the application of points of order to unreported measures in the House of Representatives.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules, and in addition to the Committee on the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary: 7/29/1998--Introduced. Amends the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the application of points of order to unreported measures in the House of Representatives.
